original_text: He walked in all the way of Asa his father. He did not turn aside from it, doing what was right in the sight of the Lord. Yet the high places were not taken away, and the people still sacrificed and made offerings on the high places.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 그의 아버지 아사의 모든 길로 행하며 돌이키지 아니하고 여호와 앞에서 정직히 행하였으나 산당은 폐하지 아니하였으므로 백성이 아직도 산당에서 제사를 드리며 분향하였더라

sentences.original_text: He walked in all the way of Asa his father.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 아버지 아사의 모든 길로 행하였더라.

sentences.original_text: He did not turn aside from it,
doing what was right in the sight of the Lord.
Yet the high places were not taken away,
and made offerings on the high places.
